ComicInfo.Title: At Home with the Spiro T. Agnews; Alice's Toy; Cracked Looks at Dining Out; The Explorer, the Dog & the Bone; The Growing Garbage Garble; Prison Rodeo; A Visit to Transylvania; Cracked Visits Washington, D.C.; Specialized Record Albums; Fearless Forecasts for the Silly Seventies; Blind Date Phone Calls; Ruin 222
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini try to escape prison during a rodeo by disguising themselves as a pantomime horse but the cowboy is the prison guard and he lassoes them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:40:22. [Issue ID 250445]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Bill Ward,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Vic Martin,John Langton,Bob Taylor
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Bill Ward,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Vic Martin,John Langton,Bob Taylor
